titleStmt.title: The continuation of Christ's alarm to drowsie saints by the reverend and faithfull minister of Jesus Christ, Mr. William Fenner ...
titleStmt.author: Fenner, William, 1600-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Rothwell ... and Tho. Parkhurst ...,

notesStmt.note: "With: A treatise of effectuall calling; The killing power of the law; The spirituall watch; The new birth; The Christians ingrafting into Christ; A treatise on the Sabbath; which were never before published."
Errors in paging: pages 68, 69, and 80 in last part misnumbered 88, 89, and 08 respectively.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
